name: Upgraded
description:
One gun, one enemy, one screen

In this 2D-Shooter you're tasked with killing a boss with an enourmous amount of health. Taking damage will reset your coins and heal the boss, but if you get hit while having too many coins, you'll die and have to retry.

You can upgrade your gun in the shop, but even then, you're not safe...

This game was made in a span of 48 hours by a single person.

Have fun!

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated!

Notice : Because of the engine I used, some anti-virus programs might detect the exe as a threat.
